name: MobileCheckout
overview:
MobileCheckout is a point-of-sale (POS) application platform that securely bridges together merchants, consumers, and mobile application functionality. We focus on POS application integration and development, so you can do what you love, even better.

Our technology + integration with your existing POS system creates a brand new level of customer interaction. For starters, we give you instant acceptance of digital payments, immediate savings in card processing fees and 100% guaranteed PCI compliance.

The future of mobile retail will be built on flexibility - flexibility for the consumer, the merchant and the POS solution.

  • POS integration will enable the mobile retail revolution.
  • Merchants will drive the mobile retail revolution.
  • Consumers will define the mobile retail revolution.

With new payment options developing in the marketplace every day, it is paramount for the merchant, the consumer and the POS system to maintain the ability for a consumer to securely and seamlessly pay with any merchant-approved payment network. MobileCheckout is payment network agnostic, allowing the merchant to choose which payment options to offer. Better yet, the platform layer maintains the merchant’s ownership of customer relationships and data. This gives merchants the ultimate flexibility in making decisions without being locked down to any single payment network.
